name: Flicker (itch) (Pomshine)
description:
Created in 3 days for ZenoJam 5.  Play as a lost lantern wandering the forest in search of fuel.

Your fuel will drain over time, causing your flame to get smaller. Find fuel canisters on the ground to increase the size of your flame. The larger your flame, the father you can see and the more points you accumulate, but moth speed will increase. Moths are roaming the forest and will damage your flame. Getting hit with low fuel will put you into a survival state. Getting hit again will result in a game over.

Controls:

WSAD - Move

Q/E/Arrow Keys - Rotate camera

Space - Jump

Assets Used:

ProPixelizer - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/prop...

Compressed ground textures form Pure Nature - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/pure-nature-188246
